name: Gomoku - Deluxe HD
description:
Gomoku, an amusing and fascinating game that easy to take on and suitable for all ages.
Gomoku is an abstract strategy board game played by two persons. It originated from China, developed in Japan, and popular in Europe and America. The goal is to connect 5 pieces in a row.


*Features*

1. Three levels of play, meeting needs of all players.

2. Play against a nearby player via Bluetooth or your friend on the same device with Two Players mode.

3. Enable to save game progress and load it next time.

4. Great visual effect and exciting sound effects.

5. Retina display high resolution.


*Rules*

Gomoku is also called Five in a Row(5 in a row), Connect five(Connect 5), caro,omok or Go Bang.
This game is traditionally played with go pieces (black and white stones) on a go board (15x15 intersections). Black plays first, and players alternate in placing a stone of their color on an empty intersection. The winner is the first player to get an unbroken row of five stones horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.


******************************************************

Fatbird is greatly honoured to bring you Gomoku - Deluxe HD and will continue to add new features, please don’t hesitate to rate us, we love to see your support and suggestion!


Fatbird also brings you other games: Ludo, Mancala, Checkers, Tic Tac Toe, Dots, Othello, 4 in a Row, Chess, Backgammon
